description.en: PC is a decentralized Token issued by PromotionChain. PC, as a value circulation certificate, can apply in transactions of some products, task-issued mortgages, promotion cost settlement, user incentives, etc to effectively improve capital transparency and settlement efficiency. It aims to transform the existing promotion industry, and completely release the promotion energy of the Internet era through promotionChain original models such as the decentralized PC APP, promoter community, mission credits accumulation system, etc.
